item.title: Convert a Color Picture to a Line Draft
item.author: Author
item.description: Here we use PS to convert a colorful pictrue to a line draft. Set up the PS software(e.g.PSCC) and input the picture that wo want to process. Click on the menu bar “Image->Adjust->Black and wihte”, or you can directly press the shortcut key"Alt+Shift+Ctrl+B". Then the image automatically turns to black and white. Click on the menu bar “Coverage->Copy coverage” to make a copy for our use. Click on the menu bar “Image->Adjust->Invert” or directly press the shorcut key “Ctrl+I”.

item.title: PACK CHORME EXTENSIONS
item.author: Author
item.description: How to pack and download a chorme extension? If you fintagd a very nice extension and want to save to local or share with others. Here are steps: Select the button for the extension in the menu bar (usually right of the screen) then choose the extension you want to operate in the menu that pops up. Choose the “manage the extension” option then popuo a new page.

item.title: PythonTypeErrorï¼šOnly size-1 arrays can be converted to Python scalars
item.author: Author
item.description: Here are the sorce code: Calculate something to NTH power 1 2 3 4 5 6 import math import matplotlib.pyplot as plt plt.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['SimHei'] r = np.arange(0, 1, 0.01) T_0 = pow(math.sqrt(1-pow(r,2)),-1) #error list L_0 = math.sqrt(1-pow(r,2)) #error list And the Error message: 1 TypeError: only size-1 arrays can be converted to Python scalars SOLUTION: Change the ‘math’ package to the “numpy” package. Here are the code:

item.title: SEARCH-WITH-ALGOLIA
item.author: Author
item.description: INTRODUCTION What makes Aloglia great? The goal of the JAMStack is eliminate server dependencies. Although Algolia is a bussiness solution, it offers a very generous free plan and performs up to 200 faster than open-source solutions like ElasticSearch. How Algolia works? Algolia provides a REST API to query and update your search indices. All input and output is provided in JSON, making it extremely easy to use in frontend Javascript.

item.title: HTML
item.author: Author
item.description: Something about HTML What is HTML? HTML is a language used to describe web pages. HTML is Hyper Text Markup Language. Markup language is a set of markup tags. HTML uses markup tags to describe Web pages. HTML tag HTML markup tags are often referred to as HTML tags. HTML tags are keywords surrounded by Angle brackets, such as <HTML>. HTML tags usually come in pairs, such as <b> and </b>.

item.title: HTML/CSS
item.author: Author
item.description: Brief Introduction Here are some introductions and choose one or more you want to learn. HTML HTML stands for Hpertext Markup Language and is the key to the world of Web technology. Click here to learn more about it. XHTML XHTML is more rigorous and clean version of HTML. There are the differences between HTML and XHTML, and the advantages of XHTML for you. And, how to upgrade your site to XHTML to help quickly deploy XHTML technology.
